explains: n. 雪松；香柏；西洋杉木
wordGroup: red cedar 铅笔柏；红刺柏
cedar rapids 锡达拉皮兹市（美国城市）

sentences.en: The yacht is built of cedar strip planking.
sentences.cn: 这艘游艇用雪松木板材制成。

sentences.en: Quiet mountain roads wind through groves of bamboo and cedar.
sentences.cn: 幽静的山路蜿蜒穿过竹林和雪松林。

sentences.en: It combined with the resinous cedar smell of the logs to produce a sickening sensation that was near to nausea.
sentences.cn: 它与那些圆木的雪松树脂气味混杂在一起，以产生一种快要呕吐的恶心感觉。
